brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts elaboration on the concept of peer-to-peer networking using an instant messaging (IM) application. Two peer devices are connected via a network cloud. Each is acting as both a client and server.

Peer 1: Instant Message application (Client and server)
Sent Text: "Meeting tonight."
Received Text: "I'll be there."
Sent Text: "Good."

Peer 2: Instant Message application (Client and server)
Received Text: "Meeting tonight."
Sent Text: "I'll be there."
Received Text: "Good."

Both clients:
- Initiate a message
- Receive a message
Both clients simultaneously send and receive
